name: Red Alerts
title: Red Alerts
author: Supercheese
description: Adds some useful warnings such as Low Power and Structure Destroyed, announced either by the EVA voices from the Command and Conquer game series or with unvoiced soundsets.
description_original: Adds some useful warnings such as Low Power and Structure Destroyed, announced either by the EVA voices from the Command and Conquer game series or with unvoiced soundsets.
